column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|

|IPM|CIM03D60C1B3、CIM03S50H1A1S/CIM03S50H1A1、CIM04S60C4A1S/CIM04S60C4A1、CIM05S50C2A1S/CIM05S50C2A1、CIM05S50C2A2S/CIM05S50C2A2、CIM05S50CPA1/CIM05S50CPA1S、CIM06S60C5A1S/CIM06S60C5A1、CIM07S50C1A1S/CIM07S50C1A1、CIM07S50C3A1/CIM07S50C3A1S、CIM07S50C3A2S/CIM07S50C3A2、CIS06D60L1B2、CIS06S60L1A1S/CIS06S60L1A1、CIS06S60L1C1、CIS06S60L1D1、CIS10D60L1B1、CIS10D60L2B1、CIS10S60L1C1、CIS10S60L1D1、CIS10S60Q1C1、CIS15D60L1B1、CIS15S60L1C1、CIS15S60L1D1、CIS15S60Q1C1、CIS20S60Q1C1、CIS30S60L1C1、CIS30S60Q1C1|IPM（Intelligent Power Module）集成了驱动电路和保护电路的专用控制 IC，外围电路设计更加紧凑和容易。控制 IC 与功率芯片性能的高匹配使模块更加可靠和稳定，保护功能响应更加准确和快速。CoolSemi 的 IPM 集成了高性能功率器件和高度匹配的驱动 HVIC，还集成了温度检测和自我保护功能。|
The specific parameters and test conditions are mainly based on the content of the Data Sheet report; 0 indicates to be confirmed
